title: Jules Verne's mysterious island; Marco Polo
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Storytime Collection". Features two classic children's stories; JULES VERNE'S MYSTERIOUS ISLAND; five prisoners flee the American Civil War in a hot air balloon. They land on a mysterious island, blown by the storm winds across the Pacific Ocean. What is the cause of the inexplicable events that occur on the island and will the five prisoners live to find out? MARCO POLO; set in China in the year 1260, this animated production is based on the original Marco Polo journals. Marco Polo and his servant Ton-Ton travel from Venice to China on a mission to find the Kubla Khan.
